name: Aurora
description: Will you be able to figure out what is happening on the fictional earth-link planet of Wenryll and stop the sinister group that is behind it all? Battle your way to the truth and stop Wenryll from falling into chaos!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP/Vista (32-bit/ 64-bit) Processor: Intel® Pentium® III 800MHz equivalent or higher processor Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or greater desktop resolution Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 (32-bit/ 64-bit) or newer Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0GHz equivalent or higher processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space
